parts.name: Discovery
parts.text: One sunny day, while exploring a particularly dense part of the jungle, Aria stumbled upon a hidden path. Do you follow the path?

options.text: Yes, go into the unknown and explore
No, go back to the village

parts.name: cycle
parts.text: Aria walked back to the village safely and took a nap. Well rested she woke up and felt like going out for some fresh air.

parts.name: change
parts.text: As she walked, the sounds of the jungle faded away, replaced by the chirping of birds and the rustling of leaves. The trees started looking thinner and the path finally took its end. Aria deciding to take a quick rest, until suddenly a strange noise. A tree with a face appeared.

parts.name: Capture
parts.text: As she walked, Aria noticed a group of people in the distance. They were dressed in strange clothing and were carrying weapons. You got captured and kidnapped.

parts.name: realization
parts.text: Aria's heart raced with fear as she realized that she had stumbled upon a group of hunters. She turned to run back to the safety of the jungle, but it was too late. The hunters had seen her.
